name: BattleMageV
desc: Zoccihedron Presents... Battle Mage V NFT Series 1 / Become the Madness, the Community Driven Social Adventure RPG on VeChainThor. Featuring 50 Costumes, 12 Traits, 344 Attributes, and over 240+ Billion Unique Combinations. Blending epic storytelling, amazing art, and engaging community driven activities to create a unique nft experience you won't find anywhere else. Just think of Dungeons and Dragons but with 1000s of collectors.
